title: Layout Customization and Stability Improvements - Holiday Release
description: Focused entirely on fixing bugs and improving stability across the core agent, layout controls, and viewing code diffs. Introduced layout customization with four default layouts (agent, editor, zen, browser) accessible via Cmd+Option+Tab. Features slow rollout over the week to prevent regressions during holiday coding.

community_feedback.quote: Cursor just reverted two weeks worth of development during update around December 10, 2025 at 2 PM US PST 'without any warning'
The diff/review feature is 'the single most disruptive thing' since Cursor 2.0 came out
Users frustrated with bugs and ever-changing UI, product rushing to deliver new features while users struggle with bugs

title: Enterprise Features: Conversation Insights, Billing Groups, Service Accounts
description: Added conversation insights to analyze code and context in each agent session (category, work type, complexity). Introduced billing groups for fine-grained usage tracking and spend mapping. Service accounts for non-human accounts with API keys for secure automation. Linux sandboxing for agents with scoped workspace access.
